sections.Description (verbatim): You are behind the White House. A path leads into the Forest to the east. In one corner of the House there is a small window which is slightly ajar.
Hidden/conditional transitions: Exit condition for W → [[Z1 - Kitchen]]: (once window is open)
Key parser interactions: OPEN WINDOW → window state changes to open; entry enabled.
State notes: Window state: initially closed; can be opened.

Notes: First room where a non-directional entry affordance (window) enables interior access.
